Entry.JapaneseText: この地下通路って、一度でも 使われたコトがあったのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Has this passageway ever been used before?

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの歴史において、王族が逃げ出すような 大きな騒乱はなかったと思うけど。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think there's been a disturbance great enough in Callegea's history where the royalty has needed to flee.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだな。むしろ、国王やその子息が、おしのびで 市中に下りる時に、使っていたのかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: That's right. If anything, it could have been used by the king or any sons he had to go into the city incognito.
